body.name: Anivia 1080P Full HD Webcam with Lens Cover - Pro Web Camera with Stereo Microphone - USB Plug and Play PC Laptop Desktop Mac Video Calling, Conference Live(Tripod not Included)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Advanced autofocus: High-sensitivity autofocus speed, get rid of the cumbersome focusing process. Adjustable rotation base, HDR sensor and face enhancement technology can optimize the image and beautify your appearance.
Built-in omnidirectional stereo microphone: The upgraded microphone and audio processing chip will detect noise and subtract it from the output to improve call quality.
Full HD video camera: capture the most exciting details at 30 fps and provide real-time streaming online computer camera. Automatic light correction. Manual focus webcam, built-in stereo microphone.
Plug and play USB webcam: easy to install, driver-free installation, please wait, the webcam will be installed automatically. Important: Make sure your device is connected to the network.

Wide compatibility: Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or later. Works in USB Video Device Class (UVC) mode: Mac OS 10.6 or later Chrome OS Android v 5.0 or above. (with supported video-calling clients)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 200W 1080P HD video camera Record vivid high-definition video at 30fps per second, auto focus to capture the most exciting details, beautiful beauty effects, automatic noise reduction, free to use in noisy conditions. The 1080P webcam with low light correction function can be clearly seen even in dim light, and can capture full HD video at a wide angle of up to 100 degrees, thus providing you with an unparalleled viewing angle. The lens cap is attached to keep your lens in a clear state at all times. Using the built-in fixing clip, whether it is on the LED display, the lid of the laptop or on the table or counter, you can use it to complete the work, with high practicality. Upgraded microphones and audio processing chip will detect noise and subtract it from the output to improve call quality.

Strong compatibility This 1080P camera can dynamically capture clear video and excellent audio to provide a nearly face-to-face experience, whether it is conferences, video conferencing, home video chat, games, webinars and via Skype, Google Hangouts, Yahoo!, Online courses conducted by AOL Instant Messenger, Zoom, ooVoo, Vsee, Windows Live Messenger, OBS, mixer, Youtube, Facebook, XSplit, Amazon Chime, LifeSize and FaceTime for Mac, laptops and PCs, and other popular instant Message application. Suitable for mainstream devices, good for Windows 7, 8, 10 or higher, Mac OS 10.6 or higher;
